title: Сотрудник съемочной группы российского телеканала попал под израильский обстрел в Ливане
cleaned_sentences: In Lebanon, an employee of the crew of the Russian television channel Russia Today (RT) fell under fire on the territory of Lebanon.
About Sunday, January 26, in its Telegram channel reports RT.
According to the publication, a team of journalists shot a report on the return of residents to the city of Marun-Er-Rizes after the establishment of the ceasefire regime.
As a result of the Israeli shelling, an RT employee was injured in the stomach and an easy injury to the head.
The man was taken to the nearest hospital.
On November 27, 2024, the Sputnik correspondent in Lebanon Abdelcader Al-Bai was injured by the legs when shelling from the Israeli army.
This happened while working on the plot on the withdrawal of Israeli troops from the south of Lebanon.
